Findings

Gallery.Infinity * Infinity 这里汇集了所有我喜爱的作品：从学院派到印象派、从摄影到 3D 艺术。 生机勃勃的绿、甜美的粉、温暖的橙黄、冷静的蓝，克制的黑白， 这一切的色彩组成了我们生活的全部 From academic to impressionism, from photographs to 3D arts, here collects all of my favorite artworks. Vibrant green, sweet pink, warm orange, calm blue, rustic black & white, that's all about life .
2022.11 / 地坛红叶(Red Leaves in Ditan Park) / Photoed at Beijing, Ditan Park
2022.11 / 秋日的地坛 (Ditan park in Autumn) / Photoed at Beijing, Ditan Park
2022.11 / 孩子的地坛 (The Child in Ditan Park) / Photoed at Beijing, Ditan Park
2022.11画中的地坛 (Ditan park in the painting)Photoed at Beijing, the North Gate of Ditan Park人生海海，你我亦是画中人
2020.04 / The Kid and His Friend / Photoed at Bristol Brandon hill
2020.04 / A Chair in Spring / Photoed at Bristol Brandon hill春日的布里斯托，落英缤纷，美不胜收
